name: Animal puzzles Game Puzzles for children
name_original: Animal puzzles Game Puzzles for children
description: Moving the individual pieces of the puzzle, assemble the whole picture. Each picture of these simple puzzles is bright and funny, so the youngest children will undoubtedly like it. In addition, puzzles help train attention, memory and logic from a very young age. As soon as the child learns to quickly and correctly assemble jigsaw puzzles for the smallest, you can try to collect jigsaw puzzles for older children.
